summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2934, for the improvement of the alley in block 14, Denny-Fuhrman Addition (being the alley between North Broadway and 10th Avenue North, from Edgar Street to Hamlin Street) all in the City of Seattle,, by paving the same with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation; providing for the necessary surface drainage,; under Ordinance No. 35423 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
